man this ones gonna be sweet!! THANKS

I have stuff to share,but everytime i try to up a torrent all i get is invalid tracker,ive tried maketorrent 2 and utorrent to create them,still no joy,and yes before someone suggests it i have updated the tracker using the announce url on the upload page,ive upped stuff before so i know how to do it,any help would be appreciated.good up by the way.
but mad_flyer, trust me, any add-on that comes on usenet which hasn't been around here yet, will be uploaded here anyway..and also the other way around :)

what a glorious day for flightsimmers.

I have an odd request:

Thankyou 4X-AXG for this great upload, it is much appricated.

Readyed, instead of calling people who 'UPLOAD' and are willing to give their time up so us/we/the TPB flight sim community can have the best of the new releases that some of us can't afford.

4X-AXG has done a bloody lot for the TPB flight sim community and i'll be darned if i see a low level loner such as yourself act like that towards somebody who is willing to help others and who is willing to give their own time up to upload such great payware releases!

So next time you go to open your gob and are about to put something like that towards somebody who has given so much, THINK!

And think about yourself and if you were a person such as 4X-AXG who did so much for this bloody community, how would you feel?!

Or atleast start showing some bloody respect for those who deserve it!

Think i've already mentioned this, but thanks for the upload and look forward to future realeases.

NJ
thanks.. but for your information.. this is not a standalone SP.. you still need SP1 to correct the FDE problem

If you have downloaded this torrent, then you have helped put PSS out of buissness. That means they will make no more addons. For proof, go to "http://www.phoenix-simulation.co.uk" and see for your self. I hope your happy!
